ing: 2 (6.5 ounce) cans minced clams, with juice
des: "Makes a tasty sauce that's great over spaghetti or linguine. Be sure to have a big hunk of Italian bread ready to soak up every last drop!"
ins:
In a large saucepan, lightly brown garlic in olive oil. Stir in parsley, clams with juice, crushed tomatoes, salt and pepper to taste.
Simmer for 45 minutes. Serve over cooked pasta.
